# withoutUI

**Type Property**

Specifies that no UI should accompany the unmount operation.

## Declaration

```swift
static var withoutUI: FileManager.UnmountOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

If this option is not specified when calling [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileManager/unmountVolume(at:options:completionHandler:)], any needed UI will delay completion of the completion handler.

## Unmount Behavior

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an unmount option set from the given raw value.
- **allPartitionsAndEjectDisk**: Specifies that all partitions on an unmountable disk should be unmounted.
